EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationOthe.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-based Payment Arrangement, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationStat.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to state and local income tax expense (benefit), net of federal tax expense (benefit).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Adjustments, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherAdjustments.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, State and Local Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationStateAndLocalInco.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to state and local income tax expense (benefit).

InsuranceTax.label: Insurance Tax
InsuranceTax.description: Represents total insurance tax expense reflected in the income statement for each period presented.

Land.label: Land
Land.description: Amount before accumulated depletion of real estate held for productive use, excluding land held for sale.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PaymentsToAcquireBuildings.label: Payments to Acquire Buildings
PaymentsToAcquireBuildings.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of buildings (properties) whether for investment or use.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireLand.label: Payments to Acquire Land
PaymentsToAcquireLand.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes land acquired for use by the owner.

PrepaidExpenseNoncurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Noncurrent
PrepaidExpenseNoncurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance for expenses which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

EquitySecuritiesFvNi.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI
EquitySecuritiesFvNi.description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.
